length.description: length of the cable in meters

startPortId.description: Id of the port at the start side of the cable

startPortName.description: Name of the port at the start side of the cable

startPortDirection.description: Direction of the port. See documentation for explainations of the possible values.

startConnectorId.description: Id of the connector attached to the start side of the cable

startConnectorColor.description: Name of the connector, e.g. housing or sleeve, attached to the start side of the cable

startConnectorName.description: Name of the connector attached to the start side of the cable

startConnectorGender.description: Gender of the connector attached to the start side of the cable

startConnectorIcon.description: Icon for use with this connector. These can be fetched as SVG icons from /icons/{id}.svg

startDeviceId.description: Id of the device at the start side of the cable

startDeviceName.description: Name of the device at the start side of the cable

startRackId.description: Id of the rack at the start side of the cable

startRackName.description: Name of the rack at the start side of the cable

startRoomId.description: Id of the room at the start side of the cable

startRoomName.description: Name of the room at the start side of the cable

startBuildingId.description: Id of the building at the start side of the cable

startBuildingName.description: Name of the building at the start side of the cable

startSiteId.description: Id of the site at the start side of the cable

startSiteName.description: Name of the site at the start side of the cable

endPortId.description: Id of the port at the end side of the cable

endPortName.description: Name of the port at the end side of the cable

endPortDirection.description: Direction of the port. See documentation for explainations of the possible values.

endConnectorId.description: Id of the connector attached to the end side of the cable

endConnectorColor.description: Name of the connector, e.g. housing or sleeve, attached to the end side of the cable

endConnectorName.description: Name of the connector attached to the end side of the cable

endConnectorGender.description: Gender of the connector attached to the end side of the cable

endConnectorIcon.description: Icon for use with this connector. These can be fetched as SVG icons from /icons/{id}.svg

endDeviceId.description: Id of the device at the end side of the cable

endDeviceName.description: Name of the device at the end side of the cable

endRackId.description: Id of the rack at the end side of the cable

endRackName.description: Name of the rack at the end side of the cable

endRoomId.description: Id of the room at the end side of the cable

endRoomName.description: Name of the room at the end side of the cable

endBuildingId.description: Id of the building at the end side of the cable

endBuildingName.description: Name of the building at the end side of the cable

endSiteId.description: Id of the site at the end side of the cable

endSiteName.description: Name of the site at the end side of the cable
